abstract: On Thursday, the company, whose guitars have been plucked by the likes of the Beatles, filed for an initial public offering as it looks to raise cash and amplify its standing in the music world.
snippet: On Thursday, the company, whose guitars have been plucked by the likes of the Beatles, filed for an initial public offering as it looks to raise cash and amplify its standing in the music world.
lead_paragraph: Fender Musical Instruments, whose guitars have been plucked by the likes of the Beatles and other famed artists, is now aiming to rock a different stage: the public markets.

headline.main: Fender Looks to Rock the Public Markets
